settings.disablePremiumMessage: This will disable all premium features

paywall.title: Upgrade to Premium
paywall.subtitle: Unlock the full FoodSnap experience
paywall.feature1Desc: Log as many meals as you want, every day
paywall.feature2Desc: View detailed meal history and daily summaries
paywall.feature3Desc: AI-powered meal recommendations based on your ingredients
paywall.feature4Desc: Step-by-step cooking guides with healthier options
paywall.feature5Desc: Get daily nutrition summaries and suggestions
paywall.disclaimer: Subscription automatically renews unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Payment will be charged to your App Store or Google Play account.
paywall.webNotSupported: Purchases are only available in the mobile app. Please download from App Store or Google Play.
paywall.packageNotAvailable: Subscription packages are not available. Please try again later.
paywall.activated: Welcome to Premium! Enjoy all the features.
paywall.purchaseRestored: Your purchase has been restored successfully!
paywall.noSubscriptionMessage: We couldn't find any previous purchases to restore.
paywall.enjoyFeatures: You have access to all premium features.
